title: FAANG sample metadata rules for 'cell culture'
name: faang_samples_cell_culture

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

culture_type.name: culture type
culture_type.description: Provide a child term of BTO_0000214.

cell_type.name: cell type
cell_type.description: Provide a cell type from the CL ontology.

cell_culture_protocol.name: cell culture protocol
cell_culture_protocol.description: Link to protocol describing how the cells were purified.

culture_conditions.name: culture conditions
culture_conditions.description: Brief description of culture conditions (e.g. 'on feeder cells', 'E8 media').

number_of_passages.name: number of passages
number_of_passages.description: Number of times the cell line has been re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures.

derived_from.name: Derived from
derived_from.description: Sample name or BioSample ID for the sample the cell culture was derived from.
